name: Apna Maindan
highlights: Apna Maidan is a website that provides insights into all the games available in a campus area
Apna Maidan fetched best ui prize in Hackmol 2.0
TypeScript was used for strict typing and ensuring bug free production environment
Firebase was used for implementing Authentication system and an Admin Panel was provided

name: Help right
highlights: ShantiTrip is a full fledged tours and travel, trip booking webapp
React with TailwindCSS was used for developing frontend and Express with Prisma for backend
